name: spec-driven
description: Specification-driven development using formal verification (Dafny + TLA+) to generate correct software from user intent
features: Extract formal assertions from natural language requirements
Build dual formal models (Dafny for structure, TLA+ for behavior)
Verify specifications using dafny verify and TLC model checker
Generate TypeScript implementations with Zod validation
Proactive agents for assertion generation and conflict resolution
commands: /probe-domain - Bootstrap specification by identifying software archetype and domain
/interview - Extract formal assertions from natural language requirements
/verify - Run formal verification on Dafny and TLA+ specs
/generate - Generate implementation code from verified specifications
/show-spec - Display current specification state and assertion coverage
